markdownRemark.html:
So I'm trying out phpPgAdmin and I'm glad to report how cool it is. Its very much different than phpMyAdmin but I believe that is the case simply because Postgres is different than MySQL in general.

I'd like to to get to a point where I'm comfortable with postgres so that I can troubleshoot bugs if and when the occur in porting some of my applications to postgres. I'm using MDB2 with Nexista, so it shouldn't be too hard, and I also have a PDO connector in the works which I've tested with SQLite a little.
